resources.string: Congrats! You entered the correct word for the prompt :)
Sorry, the word you chose is not relevant to the prompt :(

As everyone knows, baby kissing is the basis of modern day politics. As a politician, you must interact with these little humans. In this game, you will be given instructions on how to interact with the baby. You have 30 seconds to make the baby as happy as possible.
In this game you will be giving a speech to public given a topic. What you need to do is to select the related word from the four possible choices and type it as an input

In this game you are sorting out the policies of your party. As the campaign leader, you decide what your party should fight for. However, the general populace will not always be happy with what you decide on, so use your judgement to decide what may be best for the country.
Invalid Password.We expected you to enter more than 4 characters for password
Invalid Username or email.Please make sure it is not empty or matches email format.
Congratulations! You have made reasonable choices with the given proposals. Your charisma made you one of the most popular candidates in this election.
Unfortunately, you underwhelming performance during this stage made you rated as one of the worst candidates in this election
this is the summary for all 3 game scores
